modName: UNP - Bondage - A MashUp by Nightasy
summary: This is a customized UNP body with an armor mashup that I personally use when I play Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
SPECIAL ANNOUNCEMENT
Texture and Mesh modding in TESO
Go to this link and show your support!!!
http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1426220-client-side-customization/

[img]http://static-5.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/3076419-1435107791.jpg[/img]

NOTE: The below video was made before the armor became independant. Now it does not require the Void Armor mod and it has a brand new custom made bondage style gag (helmet).

[youtube]bLshQXQu04M[/youtube]


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation Requirements:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. Install Dimonized's UNP BASE Main body V1dot2.
Location:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

2. Install this mod.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to get the armor in game:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. After following the installation instructions go to a blacksmith location and craft the Bondage Armor located in the Hide Armor section.

2. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED: Because the armor does not actually have a weight slider you should set your characters weight to zero. You do not have to but I recommend doing it.

3. To set your characters weight to zero type "showracemenu" in the console without the quotes.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Important Stuff you should know:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. This mod does not have a weight slider because the body being shown with the armor is actually a custom UNP mesh. It is skinny with a bubble butt.
2. I am sharing this armor with the community because I love using it and figure someone else might as well.
3. I do have plans on making the armor with a working weight slider when I have time. I just don't have the time right now to do that.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
What was used and who made it: (Credits)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99
Location: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

2. R18PN 05 - Bs Bondage set for HGEC by NPR
Location: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/31239

3. HGEC Gothic Mistress by Cold Blood
Location: http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/32682

4. Void armor by Hentai - Nexus Exclusive - by Hentai
Location: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11871

5. Warglaives and Silverlight Armor 099 CBBE by jojjo and Frozzled
Location: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10251

6. UNP - Ultra Skimpy Armor by Nightasy by Nightasy
Location: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9546

7. The mask was custom made specifically for this armor.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Special Thanks:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bethesda, Nifskope, Autodesk, Niftools (Figment), FOMM (Timeslip), GIMP
Dimonized for his wonderful UNP body that has really changed Skyrim for many of us.
NPR for the awesome mesh and texture work done back in the old days of Oblivion.
Cold Blood for the awesome mesh and texture work done back in the days of Oblivion.
Jojjo and Frozzled for the wonderful arm bracers which are on the armor.
Hentai for the release of the awesome Void Armor which I have enjoyed toying with for quite some time.

NOTE: Without the people mentioned above a lot of armors out now wouldn't have ever been made. Kudos to all of you.
author: Nightasy
